      • handlePhaseEvent

        public TurnAndPhaseManager.ResultType handlePhaseEvent(IPlayer currentPlayer,
                                              int bonusUnitsLeft,
                                              java.util.List<IPlayer> players)
        Tells PhaseHandler to changePhase if some conditions is met. Return is ComputeBonusForF0 if if a new bonus shall be computed in F0. Return is ComputeBonusForF1 is 0 if a new turn has begun (and not in F0) so that Game knows it's time to compute a new bonus. Return is ChangedPhase if a change of phase has taken place. Return is DoNothing if the phase didn't change.
